title: Squeezed Light Source via Optical Parametric Oscillation (Refined)
description: Generates quadrature-squeezed vacuum states using a sub-threshold optical parametric oscillator with impedance-matched cavity, PDH locking, and phase-coherent local oscillator

physics_explanation: A 1064nm seed laser is frequency-doubled to 532nm pump, ensuring phase coherence between pump and local oscillator. The pump drives a sub-threshold PPLN-based OPO cavity (impedance-matched with Input Coupler R=99.8% matched to M1 R=99.8% + losses). Degenerate parametric down-conversion generates squeezed vacuum at 1064nm with reduced quantum noise in one quadrature. The phase-coherent LO interferes with squeezed output at a 50:50 beam splitter, and balanced homodyne detection measures quadrature noise below the shot-noise limit. PDH locking stabilizes the OPO cavity resonance, while precision temperature control maintains PPLN phase-matching.

component_justifications.Seed Laser (1064nm): Ultra-stable 1064nm laser serving dual purpose: frequency-doubled to create pump AND used directly as LO, ensuring phase coherence and eliminating independent phase noise
component_justifications.SHG Input Lens: Focuses 1064nm seed into SHG crystal for efficient second-harmonic generation
component_justifications.SHG Crystal: PPLN crystal for second-harmonic generation (1064nm → 532nm), creating pump that is inherently phase-locked to LO
component_justifications.SHG Separator: Dichroic mirror separating frequency-doubled 532nm pump from residual 1064nm (which becomes LO)
component_justifications.Pump Steering Mirror: Directs 532nm pump upward from SHG path to OPO input path
component_justifications.Pump Turning Mirror: Turns pump beam horizontally toward phase modulator and OPO cavity
component_justifications.Phase Modulator: EOM at 20MHz provides phase modulation sidebands for Pound-Drever-Hall locking of OPO cavity
component_justifications.Isolator: Prevents back-reflections from OPO cavity from destabilizing the pump
component_justifications.HWP1: Rotates pump polarization to match PPLN crystal acceptance for type-0 phase-matching
component_justifications.Mode-Matching Lens 1: First element of telescope matching pump beam waist to OPO cavity eigenmode
component_justifications.Mode-Matching Lens 2: Completes mode-matching telescope for optimal pump-cavity coupling
component_justifications.Pump Injection Mirror: Directs pump upward into OPO cavity through input coupler
component_justifications.Input Coupler: Piezo-mounted dichroic mirror (R=99.8% @ 1064nm, T=95% @ 532nm) - impedance-matched to cavity losses for optimal squeezing, actuated by PDH servo
component_justifications.PPLN Crystal: Nonlinear medium for degenerate optical parametric oscillation (532nm → 1064nm + 1064nm), generating squeezed vacuum states
component_justifications.Curved Mirror M1: High-reflector (R=99.8%) end mirror with 50mm radius of curvature defining stable OPO cavity geometry
component_justifications.Reflection Monitor: Fast photodiode detecting reflected pump light for PDH error signal generation
component_justifications.Pump Separator: Dichroic mirror separating residual 532nm pump from 1064nm squeezed output
component_justifications.Pump Dump: Absorbs waste 532nm light to prevent stray reflections
component_justifications.Output Mode-Matching Lens 1: First lens matching squeezed beam spatial mode to local oscillator mode at homodyne detector
component_justifications.Output Mode-Matching Lens 2: Second lens completing mode-matching telescope for optimal homodyne visibility
component_justifications.Green Filter: Additional dichroic filter (HR@532nm, HT@1064nm) ensuring no residual pump contaminates homodyne detector
component_justifications.HWP2: Rotates squeezed state quadrature angle relative to LO to select measured quadrature (amplitude or phase)
component_justifications.Homodyne BS: 50:50 beam splitter interfering squeezed vacuum with bright local oscillator for balanced homodyne detection
component_justifications.LO Steering Mirror 1: Directs residual 1064nm (LO) from SHG separator toward piezo mirror
component_justifications.LO Piezo Mirror: Piezo-actuated mirror providing fine phase control of LO for homodyne quadrature selection
component_justifications.LO Steering Mirror 2: Directs LO beam upward to combine with squeezed output at homodyne BS
component_justifications.Homodyne Detector: Balanced photodetector with 98% quantum efficiency measuring photocurrent difference to extract quadrature noise
component_justifications.Spectrum Analyzer: RF spectrum analyzer measuring noise power spectral density to verify squeezing below shot-noise level
component_justifications.PPLN Temperature Controller: Precision controller maintaining PPLN crystal at 50°C ± 0.01°C for stable phase-matching (critical: Δλ ~ 0.1nm/°C)
component_justifications.PDH Lock Electronics: Servo system generating error signal from reflection monitor and controlling Input Coupler piezo to lock cavity resonance

expected_outcome: Spectrum analyzer shows noise power reduced 3-10 dB below shot-noise level in the squeezed quadrature (typically amplitude-squeezed), while orthogonal quadrature shows corresponding anti-squeezing. Squeezing bandwidth ~10-100 MHz limited by cavity linewidth. Rotating HWP2 by 45° exchanges squeezed and anti-squeezed quadratures. Temperature drift of PPLN causes loss of squeezing, demonstrating need for active stabilization. PDH lock maintains cavity resonance with <1 Hz linewidth.
